title: Walnut Canyon National Monument: Field Trips
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Field Trips                Plan A Field Trip         The early inhabitants of Walnut Canyon built some of their homes along the canyon walls. Steve Nycz, NPS Park Ranger  To schedule a field trip to one or more of the Flagstaff Area National Monuments-Walnut Canyon, Wupatki or Sunset Crater Volcano, please complete the registration forms one month in advance of your trip. Being prepared will help you and your students get the most out of your visit to the Flagstaff National Monuments. A Teacher Fact Sheet (pdf) will help in your planning process.  Educational Fee Waivers:  If you would like to see if your group qualifies for an Educational Fee Waiver, please click here.     Apply for an Educational Fee Waiver.
